attributes.action: “The United Kingdom Government to intervene in the Gambia to prevent genocide"
attributes.background: The incumbent Dictator Yahya Jammeh on the 2 December 2016, accepted the result of the election held 1st of December and conceded defeat and now refusing to relinquish power to the Coalition Government come January.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government to urge President Yahya Jammeh to leave office.
